title: IBody2.CreatePlanarTrimSurfaceDLL
description: Creates a planar trim surface for this body.
signature:
System.Boolean CreatePlanarTrimSurfaceDLL( 
   System.Object
Points
,
   System.Object
Normal
)

parameters.name: Points
parameters.description: Array of the points for the surface; trim curves are automatically created between each sequential vertex

returns: True if planar trim surface is created, false if not
remarks:

IBody2:CreateTrimmedSurface
,
IBody2::ICreatePlanarSurface
, and

.
